trips.name: Łódź sightseeing
trips.description: An unforgettable tour of the fourth largest city in Poland. You will see the terrible living conditions of the local people

trips.name: Visit Kaslo today
trips.description: Become familiar with some of Kaslo's attractive characteristics. This is only a starting point to all Kaslo has to offer!

trips.name: Sibir departure
trips.description: Are you tired of your life? Do you want to change the world? Help colonize the virgin lands of Siberia

trips.name: Świebodzin pilgrimage
trips.description: A true Catholic must make a pilgrimage to this holy place at least once in his life. Tesco store nearby

trips.name: Sosnowiec metropolis
trips.description: The city of dreams and desires. We can only imagine what's going on there. Time to change that

trips.name: llanfairpwllgwyng...
trips.description: The longest town name in Europe. What does it even mean? Time to visit this place!

trips.name: Storm Area 51 with us!
trips.description: Would you like to see an alien and discover the truth? Finally, the time has come
